about_the_game:
Casino Simulator: Build, Manage, and Grow Your Own Casino Empire

Casino Simulator is an exciting simulation game that allows you to build, manage, and expand your own casino empire. This game lets you experience the complexity and excitement of the casino industry from the comfort of your own home. Here are the details to kickstart your casino adventure:

Casino Construction and Design:

In Casino Simulator, you have the freedom to build your dream casino starting from an empty shop. The game offers you various construction options, allowing you to customize both the interior and exterior spaces. Do you envision a luxurious casino, or a more modest and intimate venue? It's entirely up to you.

Hire and Manage Employees:

The success of a casino begins with experienced and skilled employees. In Casino Simulator, you can choose from a wide range of employees, from dealers to security guards. Each employee has different skills and specialties, so you must build your team balancedly. Additionally, you can increase productivity by investing in your employees' training and motivation.

Offer the Most Popular Games:

A casino is known for the games it offers. Casino Simulator gives you the opportunity to offer the most popular casino games. Blackjack, roulette, poker, slot machines, and more - choose a game selection that appeals to your customers' tastes and preferences. Additionally, entertain and attract your customers by organizing special events and tournaments.

Ensure Customer Satisfaction:

Running a casino is a customer-centric business. In Casino Simulator, you must find various ways to ensure customer satisfaction. In addition to game options, consider elements such as interior design, cleanliness, and food and beverage service. Focus on continuously improving your casino by tracking customer feedback.

Financial Management and Growth:

Running a casino requires good financial planning and management. In Casino Simulator, track income and expenses, balance your budget, and make strategic decisions to increase your casino's profitability. As you earn profits, explore new opportunities to expand and invest in your casino. A larger casino means more customers and higher profits.

Advanced Features and Progression:

Casino Simulator offers various advanced features and progression systems. Special events, VIP rooms, exclusive tournaments, and more allow you to provide your players with a unique casino experience. Additionally, rewards and achievements encourage players to progress.

Security and Responsible Gaming:

Casino Simulator prioritizes player safety and responsible gaming. Various security measures are taken to prevent fraud and ensure customer safety. Additionally, informative content and help resources are provided to reduce the risk of gambling addiction.

Casino Simulator allows you to experience the excitement and complexity of the casino industry from the comfort of your own home. Use your strategic thinking and management skills to build, manage, and grow your own casino empire. Enjoy the thrill of gambling and ensure the successful growth of your casino!

content_descriptors.notes:
1.The game features punching.
2.The game features strippers, but there is no option to focus on the stripper.

detailed_description:
Platform

Are you ready to face 7 different evolved monsters across 7 different maps?

name: Casino Simulator 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 11
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Casino Simulator: Build, manage, and expand your own casino from scratch. Hire staff, design your casino, and delight customers by offering the most popular games. Enjoy the thrill of the casino experience!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
